titles.title: A bill for the relief of Gerald L. Clarke.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for unreimbursed overtime work performed as an employee of the Federal Aviation Administration.
